channel.title: Gabe Newell's son inspired the creepy baby at the end of Half-Life
channel.description: [url]https://www.pcgamesn.com/half-life/gabe-newell-son-half-life-final-boss-nihilanth[/url] Implies hints of things to come. Or maybe we will just have to wait for baby Gray's game. ;(
